descriptionHtml:
Hello! this is my third mod on Skyrim mods this time i\'m sharing my own Follower! (Grior the Follower)

[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/aw585s.jpg[/IMG]

Grior is one of the last dwarfs in the whole world of skyrim (thats what they believe )
This dwarf have been on the side of most of the dragonbourns.... 
His luck is that he is still alive tho :)!
Dont let him go into fight solo otherwise he ll die....

[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/wj7z3o.jpg[/IMG] 
He is Dwarf you can check it into the game .. i didnt had one picture like that :D
u can give him weapons to equip..(+ helmets)
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2dw9ndi.jpg[/IMG]
Throw the file into your data file :)!
IF SOMEONE NEED HIM WITHOUT ITEMS JUST SEND ME A MESSAGE .!


[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/nozqbr.jpg[/IMG]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33529 Ruins at Riverwood
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33594 The Bandit camp
author: Sasisma
